How many people are affected by Canavan disease ?,"While this condition occurs in people of all ethnic backgrounds, it is most common in people of Ashkenazi (eastern and central European) Jewish heritage. Studies suggest that this disorder affects 1 in 6,400 to 13,500 people in the Ashkenazi Jewish population. The incidence in other populations is unknown.",GHR,Canavan disease
What are the genetic changes related to Canavan disease ?,"Mutations in the ASPA gene c
